trans-unit.source: A message query that evaluates XPath expressions to retrieve data from a message.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于计算 XPath 表达式以检索消息中的数据的消息查询。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.QueryCorrelationInitializer> and specify a <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageQuerySet> using a <xref:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.QueryCorrelationInitializer> 创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageQuerySet> 并指定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> class with the specified XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XPath 表达式初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace manager.
trans-unit.target: XML 命名空间管理器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> class with the specified XPath expression and <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XPath 表达式和 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The XSLT context.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> class with the specified XPath expression and <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XPath 表达式和 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a message query collection that enables optimizations when executing multiple queries against a message.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个消息查询集合，它可用于在对一个消息执行多个查询时启用优化。

trans-unit.source: A message query collection.
trans-unit.target: 消息查询集合。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the XPath message query.
trans-unit.target: 评估 XPath 消息查询。

trans-unit.source: The type of data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The message to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的消息。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the XPath query against the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />.
trans-unit.target: 针对指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> 计算 XPath 查询。

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved from the message.
trans-unit.target: 从消息中检索的数据。

trans-unit.source: The type of data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: The message buffer to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查询的消息缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the XPath query against the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer" />.
trans-unit.target: 针对指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer" /> 计算 XPath 查询。

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved from the message buffer.
trans-unit.target: 从消息缓冲区中检索的数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XPath expression for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> 实例的 XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager" /> 实例关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery" />。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace manager.
trans-unit.target: XML 命名空间管理器。
